td.paragraph: Due
to persistent symptoms, we advised continuing OTC pain relief with
Tylenol or Motrin as needed. He is scheduled for in-person follow-up
on 07/25 to further investigate the cause of neuropathic symptoms,
with possible consideration of repeat imaging or EMG studies if
symptoms persist. All questions and concerns answered and addressed.
Heart healthy diet and healthy lifestyle modifications were
encouraged and endorsed. He is in agreement with the plan.

Patient was informed of the telemedicine visit by our office staff. Telemedicine was described in detail to the patient as the use of synchronous video and audio communication to provide clinical care from a distance. A telemedicine visit can provide the same medical standard of care for specific conditions. The patient was informed that the practice staff located at the provider's office would assist in carrying out any recommendations and clinical care.
Patient Location: Home
Lack of strict HIPPA Rules. Patient expressed verbal interest in the telemedicine visit and granted consent to proceed.

td.paragraph: This is a 21-year-old male with a significant medical history of peripheral neuropathy, who presents today for a cardiovascular follow-up via TMV for ongoing symptoms and review of recent lab results. He reports persistent right foot pain and swelling, along with numbness in the toes. He is currently on a steroid pack and has undergone a recent negative lower extremity ultrasound. He is under neurology follow-up, though a definitive diagnosis has not yet been made.
ABI/PVR: RLE of 1.32 and LLE of 1.30.
Carotid doppler: Mild plaque.
Venous reflux: No evidence for DVT, but significant venous insufficiency.
Echocardiogram: Preserved EF and no significant valvular abnormalities

Due to persistent symptoms, we advised continuing OTC pain relief with Tylenol or Motrin as needed. He is scheduled for in-person follow-up on 07/25 to further investigate the cause of neuropathic symptoms, with possible consideration of repeat imaging or EMG studies if symptoms persist. All questions and concerns answered and addressed. Heart healthy diet and healthy lifestyle modifications were encouraged and endorsed. He is in agreement with the plan.
